title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7201.1 - Policy
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7201.1 - Policy

State Regulations

Consistent with the requirements of Public Health Law, article 27-F, its implementing regulations, Part 7064 of this Title, and this

Part, the commission shall obtain, retain and disclose only such HIV- and
AIDS-related information as is relevant and necessary to accomplish the
mandates of the commission and as authorized by article 3 of the Correction

Law, Executive Order, or any other statutory provision. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7201.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
